name: RONIT RANJAN TRIPATHY
college: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology (NIET, Greater noida)

full_output.summary: My career objective is to utilize my skills in AI/ML and software development to develop innovative, real-world solutions. I aim to contribute to cutting-edge projects that drive positive change. Continuous learning and professional growth are key motivators. I seek a dynamic environment that fosters creativity and collaboration.

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology (NIET, Greater noida)

projects.name: CyberSecurity Based Phishing Detection
projects.description: Developed using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) and TensorFlow. Identifies phishing domains through URL analysis and screenshot-based detection. Integrates with email inboxes to detect phishing attempts.

projects.name: Accident Severity Detection System and Alert Mechanism
projects.description: Utilizes machine learning algorithms to classify accident severity from CCTV footage. Automatically generates SOS alerts to the nearest hospitals based on severity level. Built with real-time detection and integration for emergency response systems.

projects.name: CrossBorder Transaction through Cryptography
projects.description: Developed a custom cryptocurrency named Cross-Coin for secure transactions. Implemented encryption algorithms for secure cross-border transactions. Built a web platform for users to perform and monitor cryptocurrency transactions.

projects.name: Drowsiness Detection and Alarming System
projects.description: Utilized Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) with TensorFlow for drowsiness detection. Integrated OpenCV for real-time video analysis of driver alertness. System triggers a loud alarm when drowsiness is detected, with 98% model accuracy.

full_output.name: RONIT RANJAN TRIPATHY
achievements_and_awards: Finished 4th in Intelx Awiros Appathon2.0 (Indias largest computer vision hackathon).
Top 8 in NASA Space App Challenge 2023 (District level).
Published research paper as an author: "Enhancing Waste Management Through Object Detection and Recyclable MaterialClassification," EAI SUS-DEV2023.
Currently working on the patent of ADAM
